description:
✂  Tools & Supplies I Recommend: https://goo.gl/Y7KKhY
$  Join the "Fellowship" on Patreon: https://goo.gl/ZZ4vBf


➳  http://www.blackmagiccraft.ca

➳ Facebook: https://goo.gl/hvNgQL

➳ Join the Tabletop Crafters Guild: https://goo.gl/RMMqoh

In this episode I show a simple way to make stairs for your tabletop game....not just a set of stairs to sit on top of your set up, but stairs that actually manage to descend down to a lower level of your dungeon....sort of. Listen sometimes things just need to be representational, I think these get the job done just fine. 













Background music:
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
title: Dungeon Stair Tiles For D&D Tutorial (Black Magic Craft Episode 070)
